metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20001 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: In Libav 12.3, there is a floating point exception in therange_decode_culshift function (called from range_decode_bits) inlibavcodec/apedec.c that will lead to remote denial of service via craftedinput.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
